attributes.action: Make universities & higher education ctrs liable for vaccine damage to students
attributes.additional_details: Our young have suffered so much over the past 20 months not being able to fully live their lives, been in lockdown, paying high university fees for probably the least quality in teaching ever ... and in order to be able to go out to socialise again have been hoodwinked into getting vaccinated against an illness which presents very little threat to them. Therefore I think these centres need to take responsibility for adverse reactions etc.
attributes.background: University students have been pressured into having the Covid vaccines and the institutions involved must be culpable

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about people being encourage to be vaccinated against Covid-19, but we're not sure in what circumstances you think universities should be legally liable for vaccine damages to students.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we could accept a petition calling for universities to be liable for vaccine damages where they have made vaccination a condition of enrollment.
